lead_paragraph: TAYLOR--Dana, M.,retired General Counsel and Corporate Secretary of Curtiss Wright Corporation and a retired Lt. Colonel of the U.S. Air Force Reserves, died peacefully at his home in Savannah, GA on February 25, 2016. Formerly of Montville, NJ, he is survived by his beloved wife Bonnie (Painter), daughter Jenifer Taylor and her partner Kathryn Flanagan, daughter Rebecca Radosevich and her husband Jeff Radosevich and his two grandchildren, Brooke Radosevich and Henry Radosevich. He will be remembered and celebrated for his vast but understated intellect, dry sense of humor and his exceptionally kind manner. Fox & Weeks Funeral Directors, Hodgson Chapel, Savannah, Georgia. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TAYLOR, DANA, M.
